thread.title_full: Clemson players prank teammates by feeding them Sour Patch Kids in their sleep | For The Win

author: Nina Mandell
title: Clemson players prank teammates by feeding them Sour Patch Kids in their sleep | For The Win
text:
Clemson players prank teammates by feeding them Sour Patch Kids in their sleep Clemson players prank teammates by feeding them Sour Patch Kids in their sleep By Nina Mandell February 16, 2017 9:42 am Follow @ninamandell 427 shares 
— Ben Boulware (@benboulware7) February 15, 2017 
After watching this video of Ben Boulware and Christian Wilkins putting Sour Patch Kids in the mouths of their sleeping teammates, we here at For The Win have had two reactions to this: 
1. This is amazing and hilarious 2. We are so glad and amazed they didn’t choke. More NCAAF!
